# LLMs.txt for areeb.dev

## Website Overview
Personal portfolio website of Areeb Ahmed.

## Site Structure
- Home Page (`/`): Landing page with introduction, social links, and recent blog posts
- About Page (`/about`): Detailed background, experience, and contact information
- Blogs Page (`/blogs`): Collection of technical articles from Medium (@areebahmeddd)
- Projects Page (`/projects`): Portfolio of open-source projects and contributions

## Technology Stack
- Next.js 15 (App Router)
- React 19
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS

## Contact Information
- Email: hi@areeb.dev
- Instagram: https://instagram.com/areebahmeddd
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/areebahmeddd
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/areebahmeddd
- GitHub: https://github.com/areebahmeddd
- Medium: https://medium.com/@areebahmeddd
